text.*:
The Emperor's Crew, The Red Hair Pirates

Chapter Info

107

Chapter:

1079

Japanese Title:

「四皇」赤髪海賊団

Romanized Title:

'Yonkō' Akagami Kaizoku-dan

Viz Title:

The Emperor's Crew, the Red-Haired Pirates

Pages:

15

Release Date:

March 27, 2023

WSJ Issue:

2023 Issue 17

Anime:

Episode 1112 (p. 2-15)
Chapter Chronology
← Previous Next →
Chapter 1079 is titled "The Emperor's Crew, The Red Hair Pirates".

Contents

  • 1 Cover Page
  • 2 Short Summary
  • 3 Long Summary
  • 4 Quick References
    • 4.1 Chapter Notes
    • 4.2 Characters
  • 5 Author Comment
  • 6 Arc Navigation

Cover Page[]

Cover Page Request: "Luffy watering a lion by mistake instead of a sunflower" by PN Himawariya.

Short Summary[]

The nature of York's plan was revealed in a flashback when she realized the World Government would try to eliminate her too. In the present, as a Blackbeard Pirates ship is approaching Egghead, at Elbaph a duel is set up between Kid and Shanks, where the latter is easily victorious, and Dorry and Brogy destroy Kid's ship, leaving the Kid Pirates completely annihilated.

Long Summary[]

A few hours ago, York learned that the World Government wants her dead too, but fortunately, she has a plan to counter it. She orders the four Seraphim to terminate everyone trapped in the lab except for herself, the Stella, and their hostages. She does acknowledge that she is not strong enough to fend for herself should the others find out she was responsible for letting the Seraphim run amok, which is why she ordered S-Snake to petrify her as if York had her guard down and then undo it when no one is looking. She then tells her the places in the lab she does not want destroyed before sending the Seraphim on their way. Unknown to everyone on the island, a ship belonging to the Blackbeard Pirates arrives off the shore.

At Elbaph, several pirates loyal to Shanks tell Eustass Kid that he will have to go through all of them first if he ever wants to see Shanks. Kid is unconvinced that the pirates standing before him, captain "Ball Fingers" Gerotini of the Puddle Pirates, bandleader "Memorial Blade" Fugar of the Social Club, and princess "Trembling" Pururu of the Bourgeois Pirates are fleets of the Red Hair Pirates, but Killer reminds him that there are several big names in the fleet, so he should not let his guard down.

Shanks tells the other pirates to clear out so they do not get harmed, revealing that despite their reputations as fierce pirates, the subordinates of the Red Hair Pirates are very weak, and they need the Emperor and his crew to protect them. The subordinates cheer for Shanks as he boards his ship. He asks if Kid's wounds from Wano have fully healed but Yasopp says he looks fine if he is willing to pick a fight. Shanks accepts this and asks for any updates on Blackbeard, where he is told that he left Hachinosu, with Shanks remarking he was sure he would pop up in Wano. Following this, Shanks is given information on Kid, and he calls him a troublemaker. When Kid forms his railgun to launch Damned Punk at the fleet, Shanks foresees the damage it will cause, warning the fleet to spread out and telling Dorry and Brogy to watch his rear while he moves for Kid's ship. Moving to stop Kid's attack, Shanks approaches the Victoria Punk, catching Kid off-guard and instantly defeating him with Kamusari. The Kid Pirates panic out over their captain and combatant being taken down and beg Shanks not to kill Kid, even giving up their Road Poneglyph rubbings to appease him. Shanks, however, ignores them and jumps from the ship while Dorry and Brogy perform their combined attack Hakoku, completely destroying the Victoria Punk; they tell the Kid Pirates that if they point a loaded gun at someone's hometown, they better expect to meet the same fate.

The Kid Pirates fall into the sea, while the narration says that at Elbaph, the Kid Pirates, led by Eustass "Captain" Kid, who has a bounty of 3,000,000,000, were completely destroyed.

Quick References[]

Chapter Notes[]

  • A flashback occurs where before they began attacking, York spoke to the Seraphim.
    • York realized the World Government wanted to betray her, thus she ordered the Seraphim to kill everyone on Egghead except herself, Vegapunk, and the Cipher Pol hostages.
    • York had also given S-Snake orders to pretend to defeat her, then undo the petrification when no one was looking, as she wanted to keep her actions secret since she was not strong enough to defeat her former allies on her own.
    • York also orders S-Snake to avoid a specific place on the island.
  • Sentomaru continues the evacuation.
  • A Blackbeard Pirates ship is approaching Egghead.
  • The Kid Pirates face off against the Red Hair Pirates.
    • Kid prepares to fire his Damned Punk technique at the Red Hair Pirates' subordinate ships.
    • Shanks uses Future Vision to intercept Kid before he can attack.
    • Shanks uses Kamusari to take out both Kid and Killer in one blow.
    • It is revealed that the subordinate crews of the Red Hair Pirates are considered very weak and could not survive in the New World without Shank's protection.
    • To protect their captain, the other Kid Pirates offer to turn over the Road Poneglyph copies to Shanks; though Shanks ignores them.
    • Dorry and Brogy destroy the Victoria Punk using Hakoku.
    • The Kid Pirates are announced to be utterly destroyed.

Author Comment[]


Author Comment
  • Translation
  • Original


I went to a WBC game!! The stands shook in the world-class super interesting match. It was amazing!


WBC観に行った！！世界レベルの超面白い試合にスタンドが揺れる。凄かった！！

—Eiichiro Oda
English translation by Awaikage. For comprehensive translation credits, see here.

'''Chapter 1079''' is titled "The Emperor's Crew, The Red Hair Pirates".

==Cover Page==
[[Cover Page]] Request: "[[Monkey D. Luffy|Luffy]] watering a lion by mistake instead of a sunflower" by PN Himawariya.

==Short Summary==
The nature of [[Vegapunk/York|York]]'s plan was revealed in a flashback when she realized the [[World Government]] would try to eliminate her too. In the present, as a [[Blackbeard Pirates]] ship is approaching [[Egghead]], at [[Elbaph]] a duel is set up between [[Eustass Kid|Kid]] and [[Shanks]], where the latter is easily victorious, and [[Dorry]] and [[Brogy]] destroy [[Victoria Punk|Kid's ship]], leaving the [[Kid Pirates]] completely annihilated.

==Long Summary==
A few hours ago, [[Vegapunk/York|York]] learned that the [[World Government]] wants her dead too, but fortunately, she has a plan to counter it. She orders the four [[Seraphim]] to terminate everyone trapped in the lab except for herself, the [[Vegapunk|Stella]], and their hostages. She does acknowledge that she is not strong enough to fend for herself should the others find out she was responsible for letting the Seraphim run amok, which is why she ordered [[S-Snake]] to [[Mero Mero no Mi|petrify]] her as if York had her guard down and then undo it when no one is looking. She then tells her the places in the lab she does not want destroyed before sending the Seraphim on their way. Unknown to everyone on the island, a ship belonging to the [[Blackbeard Pirates]] arrives off the shore.

At [[Elbaph]], several pirates loyal to [[Shanks]] tell [[Eustass Kid]] that he will have to go through all of them first if he ever wants to see Shanks. Kid is unconvinced that the pirates standing before him, captain "Ball Fingers" [[Gerotini]] of the [[Puddle Pirates]], bandleader "Memorial Blade" [[Fugar]] of the [[Social Club]], and princess "Trembling" [[Pururu]] of the [[Bourgeois Pirates]] are fleets of the [[Red Hair Pirates]], but [[Killer]] reminds him that there are several big names in the fleet, so he should not let his guard down.

Shanks tells the other pirates to clear out so they do not get harmed, revealing that despite their reputations as fierce pirates, the subordinates of the Red Hair Pirates are very weak, and they need the Emperor and his crew to protect them. The subordinates cheer for Shanks as he boards his ship. He asks if Kid's wounds from [[Wano Country|Wano]] have fully healed but [[Yasopp]] says he looks fine if he is willing to pick a fight. Shanks accepts this and asks for any updates on [[Marshall D. Teach|Blackbeard]], where he is told that he left [[Hachinosu]], with Shanks remarking he was sure he would pop up in Wano. Following this, Shanks is given information on Kid, and he calls him a troublemaker. When Kid forms his railgun to launch '''Damned Punk''' at the fleet, Shanks [[Haki/Observation Haki#Future Vision|foresees]] the damage it will cause, warning the fleet to spread out and telling [[Dorry]] and [[Brogy]] to watch his rear while he moves for Kid's ship. Moving to stop Kid's attack, Shanks approaches the [[Victoria Punk]], catching Kid off-guard and instantly defeating him with '''[[Gryphon#Techniques|Kamusari]]'''. The [[Kid Pirates]] panic out over their captain and [[combatant]] being taken down and beg Shanks not to kill Kid, even giving up their [[Poneglyph|Road Poneglyph]] rubbings to appease him. Shanks, however, ignores them and jumps from the ship while Dorry and Brogy perform their combined attack '''Hakoku''', completely destroying the Victoria Punk; they tell the Kid Pirates that if they point a loaded gun at someone's hometown, they better expect to meet the same fate.

The Kid Pirates fall into the sea, while the narration says that at Elbaph, the Kid Pirates, led by Eustass "Captain" Kid, who has a bounty of {{B}}3,000,000,000, were completely destroyed.

==Quick References==
===Chapter Notes===
*A flashback occurs where before they began attacking, [[Vegapunk/York|York]] spoke to the [[Seraphim]].
**York realized the [[World Government]] wanted to betray her, thus she ordered the Seraphim to kill everyone on [[Egghead]] except herself, [[Vegapunk]], and the [[Cipher Pol]] hostages.
**York had also given [[S-Snake]] orders to pretend to defeat her, then undo the [[Mero Mero no Mi|petrification]] when no one was looking, as she wanted to keep her actions secret since she was not strong enough to defeat her former allies on her own.
**York also orders S-Snake to avoid a specific place on the island.
*[[Sentomaru]] continues the evacuation.
*A [[Blackbeard Pirates]] ship is approaching Egghead.
*The [[Kid Pirates]] face off against the [[Red Hair Pirates]].
**[[Eustass Kid|Kid]] prepares to fire his ''[[Jiki Jiki no Mi#Techniques|Damned Punk]]'' technique at the Red Hair Pirates' subordinate ships.
**[[Shanks]] uses [[Haki/Observation Haki#Future Vision|Future Vision]] to intercept Kid before he can attack.
**Shanks uses ''[[Gryphon#Techniques|Kamusari]]'' to take out both Kid and [[Killer]] in one blow.
**It is revealed that the subordinate crews of the Red Hair Pirates are considered very weak and could not survive in the [[New World]] without Shank's protection. 
**To protect their captain, the other Kid Pirates offer to turn over the [[Poneglyph|Road Poneglyph]] copies to Shanks; though Shanks ignores them.
**[[Dorry]] and [[Brogy]] destroy the [[Victoria Punk]] using ''Hakoku''.
**The Kid Pirates are announced to be utterly destroyed.
